SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.gui.phases

Class ClientGUIState

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.gui.phases.ClientGUIState
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameGUIState, LoginGUIState, SetupGUIState
public abstract class ClientGUIState extends Object
The abstract class ClientGUIState serves as the base state for the ClientGUI application. It manages the state transitions and handles common functionality required across different states.
